description: The enigmatic guardian of Time, Gasu is described as an "Outsider," which may explain his and http://anidb.net/ch3775 [Iryita]`s Arabic-themed clothing. Despite the dangers of overstepping his role, he allows http://anidb.net/ch3718 [Munto] to slip through a hole in time to find http://anidb.net/ch3717 [Yumemi].
name: Gasu
